name: @such-code/svg-sprite
description: Tool to merge multiple svg images into one sprite.

scripts.test:config: npm run tsc && node dist/cli.js --config "test/svg-list.json" --target output.svg
scripts.test:glob: npm run tsc && node dist/cli.js --source "test/**/*.svg" --target output.svg

author: Erik Podrez <erya14@gmail.com>
